this_title: 水戸黄門 天下の副将軍
introduction: LORD MITO 2Mito Komon Tenka no Fuku Shogun - 1959 - Color - WidescreenAdventures of the famous Lord Mito continue. Upon hearing news of his son, MatsudairaYoritsune, going mad, Lord Mito rushes to Yoritsune's ruling country Takamatsu along withhis loyal assistants Suke and Kaku. With the help of kind strangers, Lord Mito's gang mustevade the evil attacks of those who disrupt his journey. (TV Broadcast quality)Directed by: MATSUDA SadatsuguCast: TSUKIGATA Ryunosuke, NAKAMURA Kinnosuke, AZUMA Chiyonosuke,WAKAYAMA Tomisaburo, OKA Satomi, MISORA Hibari, SATOMI Kotaro, OKAWA Hashizo,OKOCHI Denjiro
chinese_title: 水戸黄門 天下の副将軍
